Storage for each RDS instance (General Purpose SSD (gp2)), Storage amount (100 GB), Quantity (2), Instance type (db.m6g.xlarge), Deployment option (Single-AZ), Pricing strategy (OnDemand)

Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Rationale for changes: We decided to reduce performance in favor of cost reduction by resizing our web server and application server auto scaling groups to have a maximum of 2 servers. At the same time we modified the class of the DB to a db.m6g.xlarge, whereas the Web Server and Application Server classes were changed to m4.large and m5.xlarge respectively.
